mapper.sql: t.xfssid xfssid, t.dwid dwid, t.xfssmc xfssmc, t.xfsslx xfsslx, t.wz wz, t.sl sl, t.bz bz, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.datasource datasource, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_JXCS_XFSS t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name xfsslxmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_XFSS t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XFSSLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xfsslx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS xfssid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_JXCS_XFSS(xfssid,dwid,xfssmc,xfsslx,wz,sl,bz,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{xfssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfssmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xfsslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_JXCS_XFSS t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.XFSSID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_JXCS_XFSS(xfssid,dwid,xfssmc,xfsslx,wz,sl,bz,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,datasource,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.xfssid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfssid,#{item.dwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dwid,#{item.xfssmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfssmc,#{item.xfsslx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xfsslx,#{item.wz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} wz,#{item.sl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sl,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE xfssid = VALUES(xfssid), dwid = VALUES(dwid), xfssmc = VALUES(xfssmc), xfsslx = VALUES(xfsslx), wz = VALUES(wz), sl = VALUES(sl), bz = VALUES(bz), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), datasource = VALUES(datasource), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_JXCS_XFSS t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name xfsslxmc FROM YAGL_JXCS_XFSS t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XFSSLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.xfsslx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.dwid = #{value}
